fullText: The new musical 'The Outsiders' doesn't just adapt S.E. Hinton's beloved novel; it deepens it, finding in the story of teenage outcasts a profound meditation on class, loyalty and the possibility of transcendence.
dtliExcerpt: The new musical 'The Outsiders' doesn't just adapt S.E. Hinton's beloved novel; it deepens it, finding in the story of teenage outcasts a profound meditation on class, loyalty and the possibility of transcendence.
